EmailTemplate.name: LDA - Date Change
EmailTemplate.subject: LDA Fall 2014 - Date Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Academy Students!
I just wanted to send everyone an email to give you all a little update.
So far, we have 10 students signed up and we have 15 spots remaining! Super exciting as we are still 9 months away from our semester starting.
We have always changed the dates of the Fall semester.
Please note that the change has not been made on the website yet:
Please book your flights to and from the San Diego Airport
Airport Code: SAN Arrival: September 14, 2014 Departure: December 13, 2014
Schedule:
September 14th - Fly to San Diego, CA (Airport Code: SAN) September 15th - Drive down to Vicente Guerrero, Baja California, Mexico. September 16th - Orientation September - December - Please view PDF for information on your semester (insert PDF tab here). December 10/11th - Graduation for our Academy program. December 12th - Drive up to San Diego, CA. December 13th - All students fly home from San Diego, CA.
If you have any questions, please let me know,
Joy Yu
